segments.text: I can't believe my eyes at this kitchen fiasco.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing like a waterfall indoors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's right there, drying dishes peacefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea her floor's turning into a lake.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at the boy, he's practically hanging off that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching for cookies while it's about to topple.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's helping by begging for one too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's splashing down the cabinets, what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, totally unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end with broken bones or worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm shocked no one's hearing the water or the stool creaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The apron on the woman is getting soaked soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids these days, always finding trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope it all resolves without a big mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
